channel.title: Unforseen Consequences Corpse Bug
channel.description:
Right after the resonance cascade after the elevator carrying scientists crashes down climb the ladder, find the guard and take him to the microwave oven room, there a zombie is eating a corpse, right after the guard shoots it, look the the corpse of the scientist, its facial reactions are in sync with that security guard, it will mimic him.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97503992[/url]
